Summary: started as triangle then the 4 lights started moving then straightened out and dissapeared.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving to work at 5 am, when i saw 4 lights in an arrow form...2 lights on one side, 2 lights on the other. i kept driving and when i looked up again the lights were moving. interweaving as if they were raving for a few seconds, then they spread out in a straight line and disappeared one by one.
